# multiMiR  

---

The \Rpackage{multiMiR} web server (\url{http://multimir.ucdenver.edu}) hosts a
database containing miRNA-target interactions from external databases. The
package \Rpackage{multiMiR} provides functions to communicate with the
\Rpackage{multiMiR} web server and its database.
